lead_paragraph: Victor Hedman had a goal and two assists, and Steven Stamkos capped Tampa Bay's three-goal, third-period rally to lift the Lightning to a 3-2 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Hedman, Stamkos Rally Lightning to 3-2 Win Over Oilers
headline.main: Hedman, Stamkos Rally Lightning to 3-2 Win Over Oilers

snippet: Victor Hedman had a goal and two assists, and Steven Stamkos capped Tampa Bay's three-goal, third-period rally to lift the Lightning to a 3-2 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Friday night....
